analysis.key_quote: I am opposed to this rule change and reclassification of positions. I am concerned that removing the protections offered our civil workers under chapter 45 and chapter 75 will allow a government to remove them at will...
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the removal of protections for civil servants and the potential for politicization of the civil service, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
